alert.note: Alert for Huron (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 7:43AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Huron County through 830 AM EDT... At 743 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Elkton, or 7 miles southeast of Caseville, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bad Axe around 755 AM EDT. Ubly around 800 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Pinnebog, Ruth, Filion, Parisville, Helena, White Rock, Rapson and Verona. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
